member.name: T:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase
member.summary: Base class for WatsonORM.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.InitializeDatabase
member.summary: Initialize the database client. If the client is already initialized, it will first be disposed.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.ValidateTables(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Type},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@)
member.summary: Validate a series of tables to determine if any errors or warnings exist.
member.param: List of classes for which tables should be validated.
member.returns: True if the table will initialize successfully.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.ValidateTable(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@)
member.summary: Validate a table to determine if any errors or warnings exist.
member.param: Class for which a table should be validated.
member.returns: True if the table will initialize successfully.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.InitializeTables(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Type})
member.summary: Create tables (if they don't exist) for a given set of classes.
member.param: List of classes for which a table should be created.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.InitializeTable(System.Type)
member.summary: Create table (if it doesn't exist) for a given class. Adding a table that has already been added will throw an ArgumentException.
member.param: Class for which a table should be created.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.DropTable(System.Type)
member.summary: Drop table if it exists for a given class.
member.param: Class for which a table should be dropped.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.DropTableAsync(System.Type,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Drop table if it exists for a given class.
member.param: Class for which a table should be dropped.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.TruncateTable(System.Type)
member.summary: Truncate table if it exists for a given class.
member.param: Class for which a table should be dropped.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.TruncateTableAsync(System.Type,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Truncate table if it exists for a given class.
member.param: Class for which a table should be dropped.

member.summary: INSERT multiple records. This operation performs the INSERT using a single database query, and does not return a list of inserted objects.

member.summary: INSERT multiple records. This operation performs the INSERT using a single database query, and does not return a list of inserted objects.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.SelectByPrimaryKey``1(System.Object)
member.summary: SELECT an object by id. This operation will return null if the object does not exist.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.SelectByPrimaryKeyAsync``1(System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: SELECT an object by id. This operation will return null if the object does not exist.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.SelectFirst``1(ExpressionTree.Expr,DatabaseWrapper.Core.ResultOrder[])
member.summary: SELECT the first instance of an object matching a given expression. This operation will return null if the object does not exist.
member.param: Expression by which SELECT should be filtered (i.e. WHERE clause).
Result ordering, if not set, results will be ordered ascending by primary key.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.SelectFirstAsync``1(ExpressionTree.Expr,DatabaseWrapper.Core.ResultOrder[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: SELECT the first instance of an object matching a given expression. This operation will return null if the object does not exist.
member.param: Expression by which SELECT should be filtered (i.e. WHERE clause).
Result ordering, if not set, results will be ordered ascending by primary key.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.SelectMany``1(ExpressionTree.Expr,DatabaseWrapper.Core.ResultOrder[])
member.summary: SELECT multiple rows. This operation will return an empty list if no matching objects are found.
member.param: Result ordering, if not set, results will be ordered ascending by primary key.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.SelectManyAsync``1(ExpressionTree.Expr,DatabaseWrapper.Core.ResultOrder[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: SELECT multiple rows. This operation will return an empty list if no matching objects are found.
member.param: Result ordering, if not set, results will be ordered ascending by primary key.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.SelectMany``1(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},ExpressionTree.Expr,DatabaseWrapper.Core.ResultOrder[])
member.summary: SELECT multiple rows with pagination. This operation will return an empty list if no matching objects are found.
member.param: Maximum number of results to retrieve.
Filter to apply when SELECTing rows (i.e. WHERE clause).
Result ordering, if not set, results will be ordered ascending by primary key.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.Core.WatsonORMBase.SelectManyAsync``1(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},ExpressionTree.Expr,DatabaseWrapper.Core.ResultOrder[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: SELECT multiple rows with pagination. This operation will return an empty list if no matching objects are found.
member.param: Maximum number of results to retrieve.
Filter to apply when SELECTing rows (i.e. WHERE clause).
Result ordering, if not set, results will be ordered ascending by primary key.

member.summary: Add the contents of the specified column from objects that match the supplied expression.
